Text: I'm 10% through this very large torrent and none of the .rar files downloaded so far will open with either WinRAR or Z-Zip. Are the files corrupted or in some obscure format? Or do I have to download the full torrent before being able to access the archives?
The files open normally once the torrent is completely finished.

Not sure what problem sisyphustkd was having, because I've only downloaded 5 percent of the overall torrent, but the first individual .rar file to reach 100 percent opened just fine. All I used was The Unarchver, a free program for Mac. I'm sure any basic unarchiver program would work just as well.
